pr_title: Adds SpanHandler.handesAbandoned to emphasize it is an edge case

timeline.message:
Adds SpanHandler.handesAbandoned to emphasize it is an edge case

ABANDONED is an edge case which literally means don't send data. This
makes it opt in instead of the inverse which is work and confusion
causing.
